The Way You Look Tonight Lyrics from The Astaire Story
Fred Astaire
Some day, when I'm awfully low When the world is cold I will feel a glow just thinking of you And the way you look tonight
Oh but you're lovely with your smile so warm And your cheeks so soft There is nothing for me but to love you Just the way you look tonight

Lovely never, never change Keep that breathless charm Oh won't you please arrange it? 'Cause I love you just the way you look tonight Just the way you look tonight
